Sentencas: High temperature steam electrolysis using solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) technology can provide hydrogen as fuel for transport or as base chemical for chemical or pharmaceutical industry.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: SOECs offer a great potential for high efficiencies due to low overpotentials and the possibility for waste heat use for water evaporation.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: For many industrial applications hydrogen has to be pressurized before being used or stored.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Pressurized operation of SOECs can provide benefits on both cell and system level, due to enhanced electrode kinetics and downstream process requirements.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Experimental results of water electrolysis in a pressurized SOEC stack consisting of 10 electrolyte supported cells are presented in this paper.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: The pressure ranges from 1.4 to 8 bar.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Steady-state and dynamically recorded U(i)-curves as well as electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) were carried out to evaluate the performance of the stack under pressurized conditions.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Furthermore a long-term test over 1000 h at 1.4 bar was performed to evaluate the degradation in exothermic steam electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: It was observed that the open circuit voltage increases with higher pressure due to well-known thermodynamic relations.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: No increase of the limiting current density was observed with elevated pressure for the ESC-stacks (electrolyte supported cell) that were investigated in this study.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: The overall and the activation impedance were found to decrease slightly with higher pressure.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: Within the impedance studies, the ohmic resistance was found to be the most dominant part of the entire cell resistance of the studied electrolyte supported cells of the stack.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks

Sentencas: A constant current degradation test over 1000 h at 1.4 bar with a second stack showed a voltage degradation rate of 0.56%/kh.
Titulo: Analysis of pressurized operation of 10 layer solid oxide electrolysis stacks
